chrome_management

Top-Level Variables
management: ChromeManagement
Classes
ChromeManagement

The chrome.management API provides ways to manage the list of extensions/apps that are installed and running. It is particularly useful for extensions that override(override.html) the built-in New Tab page.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeManagement management

Class ChromeManagement

Fields
onDisabled: Stream
onEnabled: Stream
onInstalled: Stream
onUninstalled: Stream
Getters and Setters
onDisabled: Stream<dynamic>
onEnabled: Stream<dynamic>
onInstalled: Stream<dynamic>
onUninstalled: Stream<dynamic>
Methods
get(String id, dynamic callback): void
getAll(dynamic callback): void
getPermissionWarningsById(String id, dynamic callback): void
getPermissionWarningsByManifest(String manifestStr, dynamic callback): void
launchApp(String id, dynamic callback): void
setEnabled(String id, bool enabled, dynamic callback): void
uninstall(String id, dynamic options, dynamic callback): void
uninstallSelf(dynamic options, dynamic callback): void

Fields

final Stream onDisabled
final Stream onEnabled
final Stream onInstalled
final Stream onUninstalled

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onDisabled

Fired when an app or extension has been disabled.

Stream<dynamic> get onEnabled

Fired when an app or extension has been enabled.

Stream<dynamic> get onInstalled

Fired when an app or extension has been installed.

Stream<dynamic> get onUninstalled

Fired when an app or extension has been uninstalled.

Methods

void get(String id, dynamic callback)

Returns information about the installed extension, app, or theme that has the given ID.

id The ID from an item of ExtensionInfo.

void getAll(dynamic callback)

Returns a list of information about installed extensions and apps.

void getPermissionWarningsById(String id, dynamic callback)

Returns a list of permission warnings(permission_warnings.html) for the given extension id.

id The ID of an already installed extension.

void getPermissionWarningsByManifest(String manifestStr, dynamic callback)

Returns a list of permission warnings(permission_warnings.html) for the given extension manifest string. Note: This function can be used without requesting the 'management' permission in the manifest. manifestStr Extension manifest JSON string.

void launchApp(String id, dynamic callback)

Launches an application.

id The extension id of the application.

void setEnabled(String id, bool enabled, dynamic callback)

Enables or disables an app or extension. id This should be the id from an item of ExtensionInfo. enabled Whether this item should be enabled or disabled.

void uninstall(String id, dynamic options, dynamic callback)

Uninstalls a currently installed app or extension. id This should be the id from an item of ExtensionInfo.

void uninstallSelf(dynamic options, dynamic callback)

Uninstalls the calling extension. Note: This function can be used without requesting the 'management' permission in the manifest.
